Description_lang: Dives at his current target, striking for $220957s1 Physical damage and creates several arcs of Shadow magic that travel outward. Each arc shears a soul fragment of any targets struck from their body, ejecting that piece into the playspace. This $@spellname206458 absorbs all healing received until another player collects the piece.Collecting the $@spellname206458 inflicts $227040s1 Shadow damage to targets within $227040A1 yards, afflicting them with $@spellname227040, increasing $@spellname227040 damage taken by $227040s2%.Once the target regains their soul fragment, they are additional afflicted with $@spellname206506, absorbing $206506s1 Healing received.
AuraDescription_lang: Inflicts $220957s1 Physical damage and shears the target's soul.
